content.en: Clock Optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to address various questions related to clock distribution networks. These algorithms are being used to determine optimal clock skew schedules, network topologies, buffer circuit dimensions, and more. By employing these algorithms, researchers aim to increase tolerance to process parameter variations, reduce power consumption, improve robustness in the presence of process variations, and optimize clock period and minimize inserted delay, among other objectives.
content.da: Ur-optimering: Forskere anvender algoritmer til at besvare forskellige spørgsmål relateret til urfordelingsnetværk. Disse algoritmer bruges til at bestemme optimale ur-skew tidsplaner, netværkstopologier, bufferkredsløbsdimentioner og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer stræber forskerne efter at øge tolerance overfor variations i procesparametre, reducere strømforbrug, forbedre robustheden i nærvær af processvariationer og optimere ur-periode samt minimere indsat forsinkelse, blandt andre mål.
